hero.description: Connecting debaters worldwide. Practice with competitors from all across the country with powermatching, flexible scheduling, and affordable tournaments starting at just $30-35. Access exclusive member resources including coaches, sourcebooks, and training materials. Multiple formats: LD, TP, Parli, and Moot Court.

features.title: Ziggy Online Debate Features
features.subtitle: Check out everything Ziggy has to offer! From worldwide competition to member-exclusive resources including coaches, sourcebooks, and training materials.

worldwide.title: Worldwide Competition
worldwide.description: Debate students from around the world. Easy access for remote competitors. Sign up for one or multiple debate leagues.

powermatching.title: Powermatching
powermatching.description: Debate against other competitors with similar skill levels using our advanced matching system.

affordable.title: Affordable
affordable.description: Ziggy tournaments cost far less than most in-person tournaments—just $30-35! We keep costs low and avoid raising prices.

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Contact us at any time, via text, email, Google Chat, or Facebook Messenger. We typically respond within 2 hours.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: We value your privacy and protect pages with contact information. We will never sell your information to anyone, period.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: Ziggy lets you and your opponent coordinate when to debate for maximum scheduling flexibility.

awards.title: Awards & Scholarships
awards.description: Our top competitors get free Ziggy swag! We work with educational institutions to offer scholarship awards for top performing students.

scheduling.title: Advanced Scheduling
scheduling.description: Select rounds/weeks to opt out of when signing up, and schedule rounds based on your availability.

realResults.title: Real-World Results
realResults.description: Ziggy debaters have proven track records of performing well in league tournaments with measurable success.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Get prizes for top teams and comprehensive rankings at the end of each tournament.

formats.title: Multiple Debate Styles
formats.description: We offer LD, TP, junior team debate, Team and Individual Parli (collegiate welcome), and Moot Court for students from various debate leagues.

prepGroup.title: NCFCA Prep Group
prepGroup.description: Ziggy TP members can apply to an NCFCA Prep Group. Exclusive preparation opportunities for serious competitors.

testimonials.title: What Our Debaters Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real testimonials from competitors who have experienced success with Ziggy Online Debate.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Championship Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of debaters who trust our platform for competitive excellence. Sign up today and take your first step toward victory.
